attributes.action: Save neighbours from being taken off air on bbc1
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Basically i think Neighbours is a great show and think it would be criminal if it got cancelled!
Although i rarely get to watch the show i would be gutted if it was not there to watch when i have a hangover / sick day off work. 
Also you have to think about the poor students and unemployed slobs whose daily routine would be put in to disarray if the show was no longer on air.
Save Neighbours!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
